title: Rotometal launches new cylinders - Labels and Labeling
summary: Rotometal, a company specializing in magnetic and print cylinders for printing machines, has introduced aluminum magnetic cylinders. These cylinders are lighter, easier to assemble and disassemble, and boast improved stability and safety during operation.  The use of aluminum alloy contributes to lower transport costs and energy consumption, offering significant savings for customers.

title: SW-Motech Introduces New Accessories For The Ducati DesertX - RideApart.com
summary: SW-Motech has introduced a new line of accessories for the Ducati DesertX, an adventure-enduro motorcycle. These accessories are designed to enhance the bike's off-road capabilities and durability, including crash protection, luggage mounting points, and a centerstand. The accessories are made from durable materials like steel, aluminum, and polypropylene, and are designed to be easy to install.
